content: froggybug 2024 mini jumpers - english version yarn gauge abbreviations for those jumpers i used drops baby merino in several colours but any the gauge is not important to keep the st stitch / stitches other yarn would do the job jumpers stiff enough use a size a bit thinner k knit than recommended on the yarn ball for p purl each jumper needs a few grams / meters / yards but at least 2-3 hours of example the one i used reads 3mm i used yo yarn over work 2 5mm kb knit through back loop to avoid making a hole k2tog knit 2 together needles and other tools techniques skip slip one st knitwise knit one pass slipped stitch over this makes 1 set of 4 double pointed needles 2 5mm knitting in the round from 2 set of 4 double pointed needles 2 0mm for the bottom ribs rib stitch repeat k1 p1 dpn double pointed needle 1 circular needle a bit thinner for stand-by stitches while knitting another part stranded or weaving colour work dpn1 first dpn 1 tapestry needle dpn2 second dpn dpn3 third dpn process - high level description 2024 bicolour design adapted to weaving on the back of the work those little jumpers are knit in the round starting with a white neck and the you don t need to read that designing part if you are using stranded colour work top part is used to insert the main colour and the increased stitches are part i am personally quite bad at stranding always pulling the yarns too tight so to me the best option is weaving in the of the design depending on my current inspiration back at each stitch however weaving can be uneven depending on the design so those patterns are designed to they are very symmetrical starting with 16 stitches increasing in 3 steps to create a neat and regular and easy enough weaving without thinking too much just keep two main rules in mind 2x16 3x16 and 4x16 the sleeves use 16 stitches each and the body the  as long as the two colours are involved i keep the main colour yarn on the right index and the secondary remaining 32 stitches colour on the left to avoid the hassle of darning too many yarn tails only the main colour is  after knitting a stitch with the white colour i make sure that the white thread which is on my left index goes used when the work is split in sleeves and body under the main thread when knitting the first main colour stitch then i keep on weaving up/down at each the sleeves use 16 stitches from the body + 4 extra stitches for the armpit stitch until the next white stitch the wrist are 14 stitches those 2024 jumpers bicolour design share many common points the body is 16 + 4 from 1 sleeve + 16 + 4 = 40 stitches the two-colour part
